narrative: Ever felt that rush after clicking 'Buy Now,' only to be hit with regret moments later? Or maybe you've promised yourself, 'This is the last time'-but it never is.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Establish connection and relate to common experiences
a_roll.shot_description: Host faces camera, soft empathetic eye contact, gentle tone

b_roll.shot_purpose: Visually establish shopping compulsion and regret cycle
b_roll.shot_description: Quick cuts: online shopping, smiles fading into frowns, people hiding bags
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Tight shots of clicks, delivery arrivals, face transitions from joy to regret

shot_data.narration_text: Ever felt that rush after clicking 'Buy Now,' only to be hit with regret moments later? Or maybe you've promised yourself, 'This is the last time'-but it never is.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter introduction would break immersion. B-roll better illustrates emotions.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Montage quickly conveys internal struggles and relational tension visually.

rationale_a_roll: Presenter introduction would break immersion. B-roll better illustrates emotions.
rationale_b_roll: Montage quickly conveys internal struggles and relational tension visually.

narrative: Sometimes, the ripple effect of these struggles quietly touches the people you love, creating stress and distance without you even realizing it.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Acknowledge broader personal impacts for relatability
a_roll.shot_description: Host shifts tone, addresses unseen tension empathetically

b_roll.shot_notes: Actors keep expressions understated; natural light.
b_roll.shot_description: Couple sits across table, worried looks, bills between them, body language tense
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Hands on bills, distant gazes, subtle distancing cues

shot_data.narration_text: Sometimes, the ripple effect of these struggles quietly touches the people you love, creating stress and distance without you even realizing it.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Internal struggles are better shown than told. Presenter less impactful here.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Visuals of credit card stress and couple tension reinforce emotional consequences.

rationale_a_roll: Internal struggles are better shown than told. Presenter less impactful here.
rationale_b_roll: Visuals of credit card stress and couple tension reinforce emotional consequences.

narrative: You're not alone. And it's not your fault. There is hope for healing-for you, and for the relationships that matter most.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Instill hope and mitigate viewer shame early
a_roll.shot_description: Host delivers comfort, soft smile, open body language to camera

b_roll.shot_notes: Stat overlays remain readable; modern style.
b_roll.shot_purpose: Visualize scale of issue; reduce viewer isolation
b_roll.shot_description: Animated infographic: silhouettes show prevalence, key stats fade in
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Flowing data overlays, diverse faces highlighted, number counters animate smoothly

shot_data.narration_text: You're not alone. And it's not your fault. There is hope for healing-for you, and for the relationships that matter most.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating empathy could feel repetitive. Visual data strengthens message.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Infographic gives tangible scope, supports narrator's reassurance.

rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating empathy could feel repetitive. Visual data strengthens message.
rationale_b_roll: Infographic gives tangible scope, supports narrator's reassurance.

narrative: Hi, I'm Dr. Leslie Davis. For over 20 years, I've helped people break free from compulsive behaviors-especially the kind that silently drain your finances, strain your relationships, and steal your peace of mind.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Build credibility and initial rapport with viewers
a_roll.shot_description: Warm close-up, Dr. Leslie smiles to camera, gentle hand gesture

b_roll.shot_purpose: Visually back up Dr. Leslieâ€™s expertise
b_roll.shot_description: Still images: certificates, Dr. Leslie with clients, thank-you notes overlays
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Framed diplomas, handshake shots, welcoming office decor

shot_data.narration_text: Hi, I'm Dr. Leslie Davis. For over 20 years, I've helped people break free from compulsive behaviors-especially the kind that silently drain your finances, strain your relationships, and steal your peace of mind.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Personal, expert intro best delivered face-to-face for credibility.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Could use photo montage but less trust-building than direct address.

rationale_a_roll: Personal, expert intro best delivered face-to-face for credibility.
rationale_b_roll: Could use photo montage but less trust-building than direct address.

narrative: Shopping addiction isn't just about money. It's about the emotional triggers, the stress, the 'quick fix' that turns into long-term regret. But here's the good news: You can take back control-and I can show you how.

a_roll.shot_notes: Cut to a comforting smile on 'good news.'
a_roll.shot_purpose: Educate on deeper causes and offer hope
a_roll.shot_description: Medium shot, Dr. Leslie empathetic, slight emphasis on key phrases

b_roll.shot_purpose: Visualize emotional roots and prospects for change
b_roll.shot_description: Animated graphics: emotion icons (stress, regret) cycle with currency signs
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Icons for triggers, animated quick-fix loop, hopeful spark at 'take back control'

shot_data.narration_text: Shopping addiction isn't just about money. It's about the emotional triggers, the stress, the 'quick fix' that turns into long-term regret. But here's the good news: You can take back control-and I can show you how.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter explains emotional underpinnings with empathy and clarity.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Abstract visuals possible, but core info best from expert directly.

rationale_a_roll: Presenter explains emotional underpinnings with empathy and clarity.
rationale_b_roll: Abstract visuals possible, but core info best from expert directly.

narrative: That's why I created Retail Therapy Unplugged-a proven coaching program designed to help you break the cycle of compulsive spending. This isn't another cookie-cutter budgeting course. It's a science-backed approach with practical, evidence-based techniques inspired by psychology and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, that will help you regain control and build a future you are proud of.

a_roll.shot_description: Presenter gestures to highlight programâ€™s uniqueness, confident posture

b_roll.shot_purpose: Show smart, personalized, scientific program features
b_roll.shot_description: Fast-cut: coaching call, open workbook, shown techniques, CBT keyword overlays
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Hands on workbook, psychology icons, group video session, science badge graphic

shot_data.narration_text: That's why I created Retail Therapy Unplugged-a proven coaching program designed to help you break the cycle of compulsive spending. This isn't another cookie-cutter budgeting course. It's a science-backed approach with practical, evidence-based techniques inspired by psychology and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, that will help you regain control and build a future you are proud of.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Listing features less engaging directly from presenter.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: B-roll/montage illustrates coaching, evidence-based methods, client optimism.

rationale_a_roll: Listing features less engaging directly from presenter.
rationale_b_roll: B-roll/montage illustrates coaching, evidence-based methods, client optimism.

narrative: We don't just focus on what you spend-we uncover why you spend, and how to build lasting habits that lead to financial freedom.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Highlight focus on habits and deeper change
a_roll.shot_description: Host sincere, softens tone to stress unique approach

b_roll.shot_notes: Montage ends on a positive note.
b_roll.shot_description: Clients smiling, celebrating milestones, gratitude note overlays
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Handwritten thank-yous, relieved faces, high-five, digital 'progress' bars

shot_data.narration_text: We don't just focus on what you spend-we uncover why you spend, and how to build lasting habits that lead to financial freedom.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating details feels redundant. Visuals emphasize transformation.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Montage powerfully shows client breakthroughs and emotional authenticity.

rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating details feels redundant. Visuals emphasize transformation.
rationale_b_roll: Montage powerfully shows client breakthroughs and emotional authenticity.
